title: Boston Bounces Back
description:
Jalen & Jacoby give Jaylen Brown, Jayson Tatum, and Marcus Smart some love for the way they performed in Game 3 against the Warriors, but they explain how Boston won the game in the trenches. Steph Curry balled out once again, but was hobbled in a scrum on the floor…Jalen explains why he doesn’t think Steph’s injury will keep him from doing his thing the rest of the series. PLUS – Draymond Green had one of the worst playoff games of his career. Find out how Boston was able to take advantage of him all night long. ALSO – Jalen had himself a heck of a night at the game…find out which celebrities he got a chance to mingle with at TD Bank Garden. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
